title: Tale of two cities
creator_credit: Ralph Thomas, Betty E. Box and Rank Film Productions
brief_description: An adaptation of Charles Dickens’ immortal tale of romance and intrigue set against the lurid background of the French Revolution. Dirk Bogarde stars as Sydney Carlton whose final act of self-sacrifice brings the story to its dramatic end. Also stars Dorothy Tutin and Cecil Parker, Leo McKern, Christopher Lee and Donald Pleasence.
